New Records: Cape Verde became the first team to reach the last 16 at the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations
Key Match Events: Bebe scored with a free-kick from 40 metres out
Ryan Mendes doubled the Blue Sharks’ advantage after 51 minutes by dispossessing the dawdling Edmilson Dove and firing home from the edge of the box
Kevin Pina sealed the victory with a superlative strike into the top corner from outside the box in the 69th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Ryan Mendes said, “I don't know how far we can go. Now we are into the last 16 and we just need to keep working as we have been,”
Bebe, who plays for La Liga Rayo Vallecano, said, “We know it won't be easy but we believe in ourselves and in our work.”
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde's biggest ever Afcon victory
The Blue Sharks, ranked 73rd in the world, in a group that also contains Mohamed Salah's Egypt
Others: Bebe made his Cape Verde debut in 2022 after switching international allegiance from Portugal
Mozambique caused few alarms until Witi’s tame effort straight at Vozinha
